amendment.description: To increase funding for crime control and methamphetamine abuse projects for Indians, with an offset.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3240 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3240 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12747-12748; text: CR S12747) To increase funding for crime control and methamphetamine abuse projects for Indians, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3240 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
